item.title: Redesigning Bitcoin Fee Market
item.description: Or Sattath (The Hebrew University) https://lists.linuxfoundation.org/pipermail/bitcoin-dev/2017-September/015093.html https://www.reddit.com/r/Bitcoin/comments/72qi2r/redesigning_bitcoins_fee_market_a_new_paper_by/ paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/1709.08881 He will be exploring alternative auction markets. Hello. This is joint work with Aviv Zohar and I have just moved. And Ron Lavi. And I am going to be talking about tehcniques from… auction theory.. to rethink how fees in bitcoin are done. Just a fast recap of how the current mechanism works. Each block has a size. Users are asked to specify the fee they will even pay.
